work.summary: Engineer in a Spotify-like squads/bands system. Conducted code reviews, coordinated releases, enforced standards
highlights: Developed and packaged node-module for a customer facing chatbot
Delivered new experiences that increased that increased information density and customer conversion on page view
Elevated code quality by starting a conversation on standards and implementing linting
Created a new shopping experience from the ground for customers to purchase related items together

volunteer.summary: Mobile navigation app that enables cyclists in Austin to find bike amenities and submit reports.
highlights: Led a mobile first design and architecture by implementing progressive web app best practices
Modeled an intuitive reactive Vue interface that kept track of open SPA components through the Vuex store
Implemented device responsive style scaling with Google material design guidelines
